de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus

Class AntiGlitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.AntiGlitch

  • public final class AntiGlitch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is supposed to detect players that try to duplicate items.
    While extensive testing through the use of macros did not allow me to duplicate items it may be of interest for the server admin to know people that try to cheat the system anyways.
    Detection is done on APS base, where clicking the inventory and closing the inventory (crucial factors in duping) are tracked.

      • setup

        public static void setup(boolean enabled,
                         boolean notifyAdmins,
                         boolean verbose)
        Takes configuration values to set up the Anti Glitch system
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if this system shall be used
        notifyAdmins - notify admins in chat when glitch is detected
        verbose - print additional information on detection

      • checkItemStack

        public static boolean checkItemStack(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                                     org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Check if the given stack contains the injected NBT tag, if so call out player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to block on detection
        stack - the stack to check for injected NBT
        Returns:
        true if a glitched stack was detected in order to cancel events, ect

      • scanInventory

        public static void scanInventory(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Scan this players inventory for itemstacks with injected NBT. Every slot that is found containing prohibited items is cleared and the player is called out.
        Parameters:
        player - the players inventory to scan
